# segmentsChanged

**Type Property**

The snapshot is out of sync due to a change of segments.

## Declaration

```swift
static let segmentsChanged: AVPlayerIntegratedTimelineSnapshotsOutOfSyncReason
```

## Getting the reasons

- **currentSegmentChanged**: The snapshot is out of sync due to a change of the current segment.
- **loadedTimeRangesChanged**: The snapshot is out of sync due to a change of the loaded time ranges.

items.description: The snapshot is out of sync due to a change of the current segment.
